short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enter 2 or 3 notes into the input boxes, click the button and find out what chord it is

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Know the notes you are playing but not the name of the chord?

Use Chord Namer.  

Just enter the notes into the input boxes and click the button.

Use a keyboard shortcut to open the app
  win: Ctrl + Shift + Y
  mac: Ctrl + Shift + L
